sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Police fire tear gas and use water cannon against protesters in Georgia who are angry over a foreign agents bill.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: 50,000 people protest in central Athens, angry over a lack of answers on how Greece's worst train disaster happened.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: People take to the streets in France for a second consecutive day of protests against pension reform proposals spurred on by International Women's Day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: People demonstrate across the world against gender inequality on International Women's Day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The UN chief heads to Kyiv in the hope of extending Ukraine's grain deal, allowing it to export its agricultural produce.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Thousands of protesters took to the streets for a second consecutive night in Georgia's capital, Tbilisi.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: They are angry over a foreign agents bill, which critics worry will clamp down on independent media and NGOs for many in the country it's a sign that Georgia is veering away from a Western path as Russia has a similar law the slogan of the March is no to total control no to Russian law and they are protesting along with others who express their disappointment and disagreement with Georgian government authorities have used water cannon and tear gas against crowds assembled outside the Georgian Parliament planned debate has been suspended on Thursday due to the disturbances the Georgian president has supported the demonstrators and promised to veto the initiative. However, MPs could overcome it if enough vote for the bill.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In response, the EU's foreign affair chief, Joseph Boré, said that the adoption of such a bill would hinder Georgia's European integration.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Trade unions and others have organised protest rallies in Athens Υπότιτλοι AUTHORWAVE Το πρώτο που μου ήρθε είναι η θλίψη, αλλά μετάνιωσα και οργή, γιατί αυτό έγκλημα ήταν προδιαγραμμένο, οι εργαζόμενοι το φωνάζανε τόσο καιρό.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Εμείς μεγαλώνουμε τα παιδιά μας για να χαρούμε τη ζωή, δεν τα μεγαλώνουμε για να τα δούμε νεκρά, για να βγάζουν κέρδη οι εταιρείες.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Τα δάκρυα στέρεψαν και έγιναν οργή. Το έγκλημα αυτό δεν θα ξεχαστεί.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Αυτή η φράση είναι στον πυρήνα της τεράσσιας κινητοποίησης στο κέντρο της Αθήνας για την τραγωδία στα Τέμπη.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Μαθητές, φοιτητές, γονείς, εργαζόμενοι και άνθρωποι όλων των ηλικιών απαιτούν το αυτονόητο από την ελληνική πολιτεία.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Να διασφαλιστεί η σωματική τους ακαιρεότητα. Οι προστατευτές σκοτώσαν με την αστυνομία στην κεντρική Αθήνα, με τις αυτοκρατήσεις αντιμετωπίζοντας με τυραγκάσια.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Η αγώνα είναι ακόμα υψηλή, όπως οι οικογένειες των θυμάτων και απέναντι σε όλους τους Έλληνες πολίτες, η επανεκκίνηση και ως ότου ολοκληρωθεί το σύστημα τεχνολογικής αναβάθμισης θα γίνει μόνον υπό όρους απόλυτης ασφάλειας. French unions are keeping up the pressure on the streets against the government's pension reform to raise the minimum retirement age from 62 to 64.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Wednesday is International Women's Rights Day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's brought many out in protest over a host of issues, with the leader of the hard-left France Unbowed Party arguing that women will be disproportionately affected by the proposed pension reform. Payez le plus cher cette réforme, ce sont les paroles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: En Paris, les étudiants ont bloqué les portes d'entrée de la prestigieuse Université des sciences politiques.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Les femmes sont plus concernées par des carrières hachées et elles seront d'autant plus discriminées par cette réforme parce qu'elle défavorise les carrières hachées.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Et on a même un ministre qui l'a reconnu.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Même le gouvernement a acté le fait que c'était pénalisant pour les femmes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Donc c'est particulièrement important de le mettre en exergue aujourd'hui.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Pour la deuxième fois maintenant, la strike a gravement affect rail traffic. In Paris, only one out of every three domestic trains has left the Gare de Lyon terminus station.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: All across the world, people have

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: been taking to the streets as part of International Women's Day, like here in Nice.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Feminicide, domestic violence and gender inequality were the main topics of protests in Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: While the continent is considered to be one of the most advanced regions for gender rights, inequalities still remain, notably in the east and south of the continent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In Kosovo, protesters criticised the country's police system, notably in the east and south of the continent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In Kosovo, protesters criticised the country's police system, the prosecutor's office and the courts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: While in Sarajevo, demonstrators demanded higher wages for women.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In Syria and Turkey, marchers commemorated the victims of last month's deadly earthquakes, with women being particularly vulnerable after losing their livelihoods and homes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: UN Secretary-General António Guterres has visited Kyiv, meeting with Ukrainian President

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Volodymyr Zelensky to discuss an extension of the grain deal agreed with Russia, which allowed it to resume sea-bound agricultural exports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: He also used the visit to criticize Russia's invasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This is my third visit to Ukraine in less than a year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: My third visit to show our full commitment and to help seek solutions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The position of United Nations which I have consistently expressed is crystal clear.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Russia's invasion of Ukraine is a violation of UN Charter and international law. The sovereignty, independence, unity and territorial integrity of Ukraine must be upheld within its internationally recognized border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Kyiv was unable to export grain after the war began due to a naval blockade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: After long negotiations mediated by the UN and Turkey, Russia agreed in July 2022 to ensure the safety of large ships carrying agricultural products. However, the deal expires on the 18th of March. La ley se creó en julio de 2022 para asegurar la seguridad de grandes navidades que traen productos agrícolas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Sin embargo, el acuerdo se termina el 18 de marzo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Cada domingo, Marian está rodeada de compañeros venezolanos, lejos de su país de casa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Llega a Madrid seis años atrás y contacta con un equipo de fútbol, un deporte que es una mezcla de fútbol y béisbol. La mayoría de los integrantes siempre han estado ahí para apoyarte, para ayudarte en lo que necesites y siempre están disponibles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Ha sido una ayuda a estar más tranquilo y a no sentirte sola fuera de un país que no es el tuyo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Se desarrolló en Venezuela en el medio del último siglo y es exclusivamente jugada por mujeres.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Los hombres, los chicos jugaban baloncesto y fútbol y las chicas al kick and ball porque lo fueron introduciendo de esa manera, porque era jugado en las petroleras, mientras los hombres trabajaban en las plataformas petrolíferas, pues las mujeres jugaban kick and ball para distraerse. La situación política en Venezuela favorece la expansión del kickball.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Las mujeres que salen de su territorio debido a lo que están viviendo allí se encuentran en otros países gracias a friendly match in preparation for a championship.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: It's the first time some women have been here.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: On International Women's Day, all of these players have one main demand. de más femenino y se entiende mejor de mujer a mujer. En el Día de las Mujeres Internacionales, todos estos jugadores tienen una demanda principal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Un espacio que de seguro lo vamos a cuidar, vamos a usarlo para un buen fin, que es el deporte, la integración de la mujer en la sociedad, no solo en el trabajo, en varios ámbitos, sino en el deporte.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Entonces queremos espacios más que todo para desarrollar nuestra actividad.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Este es un esporte único, solo jugado por mujeres, que aumenta las puertas entre culturas y personas de todos los edades.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: This year, Ukraine is the focus of the cartoon movie co-production forum for full-length animated films, which takes place in Bordeaux this week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: One of the more significant events for the forum and Ukrainian animation in general is Mavka, the forest song.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: It was conceived at the forum in 2017 and is now ready for its worldwide theatrical release.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Thanks to Cartoon Movie, a couple of years ago, we received lots of international partners and the recognition as well for the film.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: So I believe and I hope that this film will be an international success as well, because it shows also a lot about our culture and help you to learn how it is here all the backgrounds and locations were basically inspired by the real location in ukraine the film had its world premiere in kiev on the 3rd of march and broke all box office records even beating avatars figures 200 000 people have already seen the film in ukraine a feat in war time even if the industry as a whole is suffering in the country first of all it's about the lack of financing basically we lost it last year all the governmental financing went to the army needs and right now also lots of cultural representatives want also to fight on the front lines. Some of them unfortunately died, for one, but still majority of people keep creating content to keep our culture breathing. So in a way, Ukrainian culture is in your hands. I mean, in the hands of Europe and the world to support it. This film is a love story filled with mystery and fantastic creatures where the forces of good and evil will clash.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: It's being released throughout Europe this spring and soon all over the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: At a time of such grave difficulties at home, The Forest Song carries the colours of Ukraine high.
